resources.string: An application for Sistemas Inteligentes whose purpose is to detect objects appearing in pictures
All the documentation, code, explanations and resources are available at GitHub, at the following URL:\nhttps://github.com/SIRTDetection
We need storage permissions for accessing your gallery when you need it

In addition, this app will use:

 - Internet permissions (for uploading/downloading content).
 - Basic phone state permissions (private storage).
 - Camera: the application will use your preferred camera app.
There is an error while accessing the picture from gallery. Is it downloaded in your device (not uploaded to Google Photos, for example)?
There is an error while trying to create the image file. Are enough permissions?
There was an error processing the image - maybe the format is not recognised
